_comment: Scene Analysis Configuration - Thresholds for Live Mode Gatekeeper

context_window._description: Number of audio chunks in sliding window (12 * 5s = 60s)

speaker_verification._description: Cosine similarity thresholds for speaker identification. HIGH = confident match, LOW = rejection threshold.

mechanical_detection._description: Thresholds for detecting typing/mechanical sounds. Tuned for typical office keyboard clicks.

context_classification._description: Ratios for classifying room context. solo > 0.5 target_user, noise > 0.6 mostly background.

hardware_profiles._description: Pre-tuned profiles for specific hardware configurations
